sentence: Dozens  of  Palestinians,  including  children,  have  been  killed  and  injured  in  the  area  where  the  operation  took  place.
One  special  forces  who  was  critically  wounded  in  the  operation  has  since  died  in  hospital.

Dozens  of  people,  including  children,  have  been  killed  and  injured  in  the  area  where  the  operation  took  place,  with  images  and  footage  showing  significant  numbers  of  casualties.
